latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

authorName.value: Rodriguez, Ma. Victoria and Yokoyama, Shigeki

dsDescriptionValue.value: To explore the extent of influence of social networks among rice farmers' decision to adopt or not to adopt new technologies and to analyze the impact of social capital on group performance of individual Irrigation Service Cooperatives (ISCs).

keywordValue.value: Alternate wetting and drying (AWD) score and networking variable ("who to whom" correspondence represented as a sociomatrix)

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 121;
